entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Clearwater
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:41 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clearwater 01:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: -1.7°C
Wind: W 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Low zero. Forecast issued 7:18 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snow level rising to 1600 metres in the morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 7:18 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain. Snow level lowering to 1200 metres before morning. Amount 10 mm. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 7:18 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High plus 2. Forecast issued 7:18 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023
